video.title: 'Til Death
video.synopsis: This series finds comic gold in the lives of newlyweds Jeff and Steph and next-door neighbors Eddie and Joy, who've been hitched more than 20 years.

episodes.synopsis: The newly wed Woodcocks get a primer on life together from their new neighbors and 25-year veterans of marriage, the Starks.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: When the Starks need to replace their old broken-down patio furniture, Steph suggests that Joy try her surefire method of getting what she wants: trading sex for shopping.
episodes.title: Sex for Furniture

episodes.synopsis: Eddie is backed into a corner when Joy reminds him of his promise to buy her a diamond engagement ring 20 years ago.
episodes.title: The Ring

episodes.synopsis: Joy gives Eddie an ultimatum: build something while she's at work or get rid of the woodpile that he's spent the last 20 years putting together in their garage.
episodes.title: The Wood Pile

episodes.synopsis: When Jeff starts feeling suffocated by his marriage, Eddie suggests doing what he does: find something he can do without his wife, like his fake garage band.
episodes.title: The Garage Band

episodes.synopsis: A visit by Jeff's mom exposes Eddie's long-kept secret relationship with his own mother.
episodes.title: Your Mother or Your Wife

episodes.synopsis: After being virtually forced to spend a weekend with Joy and the Woodcocks at a mountain resort, Eddie is a changed man after learning that Steph dreamed about having sex with him.
episodes.title: Dream Getaway

episodes.synopsis: When their worries over the fact that he might be dying lead Joy to want to have sex more often, Eddie doesn't want to break the spell after learning that he isn't really sick.
episodes.title: Death Sex

episodes.synopsis: As Eddie and Joy square off over whether unplugging their toaster will save electricity, Jeff plans to throw a surprise birthday party for Steph.
episodes.title: The Toaster

episodes.synopsis: An unexpected breakup with her boyfriend during her first holiday visit from college shows Eddie and Joy that their daughter, Allison, isn't the girl they remember.
episodes.title: Daddy's Girl

episodes.synopsis: A friend's 25th wedding anniversary party has Joy wondering why Eddie hasn't taken better care of her, while Jeff is forced to admit that he is embarrassed by Steph's sexually suggestive dance moves.
episodes.title: The Anniversary Party

episodes.synopsis: When Jeff is crushed to learn that Steph really doesn't like hockey, Eddie urges him to start developing interests separate from his wife's.
episodes.title: The Hockey Lie

episodes.synopsis: Eddie must go up against Joy and her friend in an effort to get out of having to attend a marriage workshop.
episodes.title: Fight Friend

episodes.synopsis: Eddie takes Joy's advice and meets with an attractive new teacher at school, only to discover she is jealous of the time they are spending together.
episodes.title: The Colleague

episodes.synopsis: Eddie and his pals decide to throw Jeff a belated bachelor party.
episodes.title: The Bachelor Party

episodes.synopsis: The Starks' spring cleaning uncovers an old roll of film with pictures of an Italian vacation 20 years ago that nearly caused them to break up.
episodes.title: The Italian Affair

episodes.synopsis: During a parents' weekend at school, Eddie and Joy discover that Allison has become a ceramics major and is planning to leave school for a semester in Vermont with her teaching assistant.
episodes.title: Clay Date

episodes.synopsis: The Starks are relieved when the Woodcocks start spending time with the Cofelds -- until they realize that they miss them.
episodes.title: I Heart Woodcocks

episodes.synopsis: Joy has second thoughts after agreeing to trade responsibility for the family finances for Eddie's job as the family's cappuccino maven.
episodes.title: The Coffeemaker

episodes.synopsis: When Joy heads off to spend spring break in Florida with Allison, Eddie relishes the prospect of spending a week at home alone -- at least until the cable TV goes out.
episodes.title: That's Ridiculous

episodes.synopsis: Eddie is stunned after Joy sets up his old college roommate, Webby, with her friend Denise.
episodes.title: Webbie's Not Happy

episodes.synopsis: Eddie's summer vacation woes are challenged once Allison and her laid back boyfriend, Doug, arrive at home.
episodes.title: Summer of Love

episodes.synopsis: As a birthday gift reveals just how little confidence Jeff has in Steph being able to complete her master's thesis, Eddie confesses that he has always found Joy's singing to be over the top.
episodes.title: Performance Anxiety

episodes.synopsis: The death of a longtime neighbor exposes Eddie and Joy's differences of opinion over their relationships with their other neighbors.
episodes.title: Four Neighbors and a Funeral

episodes.synopsis: While Jeff looks to save face by entering a team in a faculty league basketball game, Eddie worries that his false claims of being a basketball star are about to be exposed.
episodes.title: Come Out and Play

episodes.synopsis: Jeff seeks Eddie's advice after Steph suggests they watch a porn film to spice up their sex life.
episodes.title: Tale of the Tape

episodes.synopsis: Shockwaves are sent through their respective marriages after Joy and Jeff become tennis partners, and Eddie starts attending yoga class with Steph.
episodes.title: Mixed Doubles

episodes.synopsis: When a misunderstanding leads Eddie to mistakenly give Jeff a valuable bottle of wine for his birthday, he and Joy hatch a plan to get it back.
episodes.title: Vintage Eddie

episodes.synopsis: Eddie's disagreement with Joy over who is responsible for repairing a broken lamp inspires Jeff to assert his own independence from Steph's bedtime routine.
episodes.title: Bedtime Stories

episodes.synopsis: After being appointed acting principal, Jeff asserts his newfound authority by freely venting his anger and suspending Eddie.
episodes.title: No More Mr. Vice Guy

episodes.synopsis: Eddie is branded the bad guy after refusing to let Allison and her boyfriend share a room during their visit.
episodes.title: Everybody Digs Doug

episodes.synopsis: Eddie volunteers to be a Big Brother to a needy boy, only to be partnered with a 38-year-old black man.
episodes.title: Really Big Brother

episodes.synopsis: Even though he doesn't agree, Eddie backs up Kenny's claim that the cashier at a fancy new movie theater discriminated against him because he's black.
episodes.title: A Raisinette in the Sun

episodes.synopsis: A close call with pregnancy sends a reluctant Eddie to get a vasectomy.
episodes.title: Snip/Duck

episodes.synopsis: Eddie's inability to cry at the movies leads Joy to suggest they attend a couples workshop to help unlock his emotions.
episodes.title: Sob Story

episodes.synopsis: Jealous of the freedom that a second marriage has given Karl, Eddie and Jeff set out to find it in their first marriages.
episodes.title: Second Marriage Guy

episodes.synopsis: After Joy surprises him with a watch he always wanted, Eddie decides to take swimming lessons so he can take her snorkeling in Hawaii.
episodes.title: Swimming with the Starks

episodes.synopsis: After failing to talk her way out of a speeding ticket, Joy decides she looks too old and is determined to do something about it.
episodes.title: Speed Bumps

episodes.synopsis: Eddie buying a fancy new convertible leads Joy to suspect he is having a mid-life crisis.
episodes.title: Joy Ride

episodes.synopsis: After Eddie refuses to comfort her following a nightmare, Joy finds a willing ear in Kenny.
episodes.title: Dreamguys

episodes.synopsis: Eddie and Joy reconsider their plan to break up Allison and Doug after they discover that his family is very rich.
episodes.title: Sugar Dougie

episodes.synopsis: Eddie balks when Joy uses a romantic evening on the town to suggest that they consider moving to Philadelphia.
episodes.title: Philadelphia Freedom

episodes.synopsis: Kenny's decision to be circumcised to please his new girlfriend leads Joy to realize how little Eddie has ever done for her.
episodes.title: Circumdecision

episodes.synopsis: Joy discovers the secret that Eddie has been harboring for the past 20 years.
episodes.title: Secret Meatball

episodes.synopsis: An encounter with a disabled man at the mall prompts Eddie to adopt an upbeat personality for the holidays.
episodes.title: No Complaints

episodes.synopsis: The Starks' spring break trip to Florida is disrupted by the news that Eddie's parents are getting a divorce.
episodes.title: The Courtship of Eddie's Parents

episodes.synopsis: Joy's interest in Eddie soars after learning that he dated her classy new friend before they were married.
episodes.title: Ex-Factor

episodes.synopsis: After Kenny is thrown out of his apartment by his ex-wife and moves in with the Starks, Eddie is delighted to find that his presence keeps Joy's temper in check.
episodes.title: The Buffer

episodes.synopsis: Joy is jealous when Eddie becomes smitten with an attractive woman doctor.
episodes.title: The Not-So-Perfect Couple

episodes.synopsis: After Kenny's complaints about his snoring send Eddie to a sleep clinic for a cure, Joy discovers that she can't sleep without all the noise.
episodes.title: Snore Loser

episodes.synopsis: Joy invites a new couple for dinner, only to be left out after they become Eddie's new best friends.
episodes.title: Perfect Couple

episodes.synopsis: Joy's manic wedding planning tries Eddie's patience and leads Allison and Doug to elope.
episodes.title: Can't Elope

episodes.synopsis: After a car accident lands Doug at their house to recover, Eddie and Joy look for a way to head off his sudden plans to marry their daughter.
episodes.title: Ally Abroad

episodes.synopsis: The Starks employ role playing to spice up their sex life, while Kenny looks to make a career out of returning lost pets to their grateful owners.
episodes.title: Dog Fight

episodes.synopsis: After agreeing to take Doug and Kenny along on their family vacation to Florida, Joy and Eddie's bickering causes a bride-to-be to have second thoughts about getting married.
episodes.title: Family Vacation

episodes.synopsis: Eddie is resigned to enduring a visit from his gay brother, Charlie, and his boyfriend, only to be surprised at how much he has in common with Charlie's new partner.
episodes.title: Brother's Keeper

episodes.synopsis: After an embarrassing incident in a local restaurant, Joy decides to return to college.
episodes.title: The Joy of Learning

episodes.synopsis: Eddie tries to keep Joy happy by giving her an expensive designer handbag for her birthday, only to have her discover that it's a fake.
episodes.title: Coupon Bob

episodes.synopsis: After overhearing an abbreviated phone call with Kenny, Joy is certain that Eddie is hiding something and sets out to uncover the secret.
episodes.title: Cold Case

episodes.synopsis: Eddie and Joy are surprised when Ally and Doug arrive home from a trip to Ecuador with some big news.
episodes.title: Doug and Ally Return

episodes.synopsis: Eddie and Joy find happiness when they decide to get separate beds; a harsh new principal at school has a big surprise in store for Eddie.
episodes.title: Separate Beds

episodes.synopsis: Eddie looks to launch his literary career with a book on zeppelins; Ally's discovery of thousands of dollars in uncashed gift checks from Doug's dad prompts a tense father-son reunion.
episodes.title: Eddie's Book

episodes.synopsis: When the travel agency goes out of business and leaves Joy jobless, it's up to Eddie to boost her confidence; Ally's illness forces Doug to bond with his new father-in-law.
episodes.title: Joy's Out of Work

episodes.synopsis: Despite Joy's unemployment, Eddie buys a new high-definition television; Ally worries about Doug's paranoid delusions that his life is a conspiratorial television show.
episodes.title: Hi-Def TV

episodes.synopsis: Upset to learn that Eddie attended a baseball game without her, Joy decides they should start doing more things separately.
episodes.title: Independent Action

episodes.synopsis: Eddie and Joy's efforts to be supportive of their friends' recent breakup threaten to backfire.
episodes.title: The Break Up

episodes.synopsis: Joy is troubled when she is unable to get any compliments from her friend and doctor, Simona.
episodes.title: The Check-Up

episodes.synopsis: After the Starks stick them with the check for dinner one too many times, Stephen and Simona look to even the score.
episodes.title: Check-Mate

episodes.synopsis: As he and Joy eagerly anticipate a concert by their favorite '80s band, Eddie becomes fast friends with the school's new art teacher.
episodes.title: The Concert

episodes.synopsis: When Joy wants to take a vacation at the beach, Eddie must buy a student's cooperation to get a pay raise that Ms. Duffy has been withholding.
episodes.title: Merit Pay

episodes.synopsis: Eddie and Joy have strong differences of opinion after meeting their new neighbors, a 51-year-old millionaire and his 23-year-old wife.
episodes.title: The New Neighbors

episodes.synopsis: On the eve of Ally and Doug's wedding, everyone dreams about what the big day will be like.
episodes.title: The Wedding

episodes.synopsis: With her racist and bigoted mom coming for a visit, Joy anxiously looks to Eddie for support.
episodes.title: Joy's Mom

episodes.synopsis: Eddie and Joy decide to sell their house to rid themselves of Ally and Doug.
episodes.title: Sell the House

episodes.synopsis: When Ally and Doug announce they are having a baby, Eddie enlists Joy's mom to help out.
episodes.title: Ally's Pregnant

episodes.synopsis: Eddie abandons his disdain for technology when a new cell phone allows him to stay in touch with Whitey 24 hours a day.
episodes.title: Smart Phone

episodes.synopsis: A stop in the gym locker room that allows him a glimpse of his new neighbor Tommy's generous endowment leaves Eddie wondering if size does matter.
episodes.title: Big Man Little Man

episodes.synopsis: Joy's excitement over directing the school musical is dashed when Ms. Duffy fires her in a fit of jealousy.
episodes.title: Work Wife

episodes.synopsis: The impending arrival of Ally and Doug's baby launches Joy into a frenzy of preparations; Doug's relapse into his sitcom fantasy forces Dr. Bialik to provide a highly unusual treatment.
episodes.title: Baby Steps

episodes.synopsis: Amidst Ally's series of false labor pains, the Starks are enlisted to attend a surprise party that Whitey hopes will kill off his aging and irascible Uncle Rudolph.
episodes.title: Let's Go

episodes.synopsis: On the heels of Eddie's new book arriving in stores, Ally goes into labor.
episodes.title: The Baby
